mapper.sql: SELECT pay_no, pay_time, pay_cardnum, pay_carddate, pay_cvc, pay_pwd, pay_total, prdt_id, user_no, delivery_reciever, delivery_phone, delivery_postcode, delivery_address, delivery_addressdetail, delivery_memo, delivery_charge FROM tb_payment limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_payment (pay_time, pay_cardnum, pay_carddate, pay_cvc, pay_pwd, pay_total,prdt_id, user_no, delivery_reciever, delivery_phone, delivery_postcode, delivery_address, delivery_addressdetail, delivery_memo) VALUES(now(), #{pay_cardnum},#{pay_carddate}, #{pay_cvc}, #{pay_pwd}, #{pay_total},#{prdt_id}, #{user_no}, #{delivery_reciever}, #{delivery_phone}, #{delivery_postcode}, #{delivery_address}, #{delivery_addressdetail}, #{delivery_memo})
mapper.select: SELECT pay_no, pay_time, pay_cardnum, pay_carddate, pay_cvc, pay_pwd, pay_total, prdt_id, user_no, delivery_reciever, delivery_phone, delivery_postcode, delivery_address, delivery_addressdetail, delivery_memo, delivery_charge FROM tb_payment where prdt_id = #{prdt_id} and user_no = #{user_no} order by pay_time desc limit 1
select pay_no, prdt_id, prdt_percent, prdt_dday, prdt_desc, prdt_name, user_no, prdt_thumbnail from tb_payment where user_no = #{user_no}
